javadoc: Adapter to access the database table for typedef data types.

methods.name: getAdapter
methods.comment:
Gets an adapter for working with the Typedef data type database table. The adapter is based 
 on the version of the database associated with the specified database handle and the openMode.

params.name: handle
params.comment: handle to the database to be accessed.

params.name: openMode
params.comment: the mode this adapter is to be opened for (CREATE, UPDATE, READ_ONLY, UPGRADE).

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the monitor to use for displaying status or for canceling.

throws.comment: if the database handle's version doesn't match the expected version.
if there is trouble accessing the database.

return.comment: the adapter for accessing the table of Typedef data types.

methods.name: findReadOnlyAdapter
methods.comment: Tries to get a read only adapter for the database whose handle is passed to this method.

params.name: handle
params.comment: handle to prior version of the database.

throws.comment: if a read only adapter can't be obtained for the database handle's version.

return.comment: the read only Typedef table adapter

methods.name: upgrade
methods.comment: Upgrades the Typedef data type table from the oldAdapter's version to the current version.

params.name: handle
params.comment: handle to the database whose table is to be upgraded to a newer version.

params.name: oldAdapter
params.comment: the adapter for the existing table to be upgraded.

throws.comment:
if the the table's version does not match the expected version
 for this adapter.
if the database can't be read or written.

return.comment: the adapter for the new upgraded version of the table.

methods.name: createRecord
methods.comment: Creates a database record for a type definition data type.

params.name: dataTypeID
params.comment: the ID of the data type that is referred to by this type definition.

params.name: name
params.comment: the unique name for this data type

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the ID for the category that contains this data type.

params.name: sourceArchiveID
params.comment: the ID for the source archive where this data type originated.

params.name: sourceDataTypeID
params.comment: the ID of the associated data type in the source archive.

params.name: lastChangeTime
params.comment: the time this data type was last changed.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: the database record for this data type.

methods.name: getRecord
methods.comment: Gets a type definition data type record from the database based on its ID.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: the record for the type definition data type.

methods.name: getRecords
methods.comment: Gets an iterator over all type definition data type records.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: the type definition data type record iterator.

methods.name: removeRecord
methods.comment: Removes the type definition data type record with the specified ID.

params.name: dataID
params.comment: the ID of the data type.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: true if the record is removed.

methods.name: updateRecord
methods.comment: Updates the type definition data type table with the provided record.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

methods.name: deleteTable
methods.comment: Deletes the type definition data type table from the database with the specified database handle.

params.name: handle
params.comment: handle to the database where the table should get deleted.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

methods.name: getRecordIdsInCategory
methods.comment: Gets all the type definition data types that are contained in the category that has the indicated ID.

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the category whose type definition data types are wanted.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: an array of IDs for the type definition data types in the category.

methods.name: getRecordIdsForSourceArchive
methods.comment:
Gets an array with the IDs of all data types in the type definition table that were derived
 from the source data type archive indicated by the source archive ID.

params.name: archiveID
params.comment: the ID of the source archive whose data types we want.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

name: TypedefDBAdapter
comment: Adapter to access the database table for typedef data types.
